body.name: BLACK + DECKER 4 Slice Natural Convection Toaster Oven Stainless Steel, TO1755SBC
features: Natural Convection- More even cooking*! The interior of the toaster oven is designed to precisely manage airflow based on the principles of thermodynamics.
Four Cooking Functions- Perfect cooking for all your favorites. Choose from bake, broil, toast, and keep warm.Wattage:1150W
Extra-Wide Glass Door- The extended oven door gives you a clear look at food during cooking.
Removable Crumb Tray- Easily remove food crumbs before they burn in the bottom of the oven.
Large Interior- The expansive interior fits up to a 9” pizza or four slices of bread.
Product dimensions: 9.75 inches (H) x 18.07 inches (L) x 18.0 inches (W)
body.description: Taste the difference even heating can make with the BLACK + DECKER Natural Convection Toaster Oven. The interior was designed using the principles of thermodynamics, circulating airflow efficiently to provide more even heating and fast results. Countertop cooking is simple using the 30-minute timer and four cooking functions: bake, broil, toast, and keep warm. Plus, the toaster oven is perfect for making your favorite frozen snacks: chicken nuggets, mozzarella sticks, egg rolls, or whatever else you're craving.

reviews.reviewText: I am super impressed with this purchase! First time ever owning or using a toaster oven and it works so well. Super easy to figure out without using instructions. So easy to clean after use. Made turkey wings in it last night and they came out even better than when I cook them in the stove. Its a bit small but not too bad especially for the price. It fit 4 nice size turkey wings inside with no issues and day before that I cooked 4 large italian sausages again no problem. You cant beat this price! Well worth every penny

The reason I bought the oven is because I do not like to reheat food in the microwave. And using our conventional oven to warm up a slice of pizza took too long. I am also not too sure you can fit 4 toast in there. I do not recommend cooking in this oven, I think it is meant to re-heat some food or toast bread. I have not tried to cook anything big in it because it is small and I think baking a cake, or cooking meat might not be ideal use for this oven. I did try cooking up some fish sticks and fries (frozen) on the drip tray and it worked great, you just have to turn the food half way through cooking. And I also added foil paper to the drip tray to keep it clean. I did try at first adding parchment paper to the tray for the fish and chips ( since I had to do it twice as it only fits very little food in the tray) and the paper burnt!! Need less to say please.......***DO NOT LEAVE OVEN UNATTENDED WHEN IN USE***............. The thing I love about it is that it is small. The oven is light, I keep it on top of my microwave and move it to the counter when I need it. We mainly use it to heat up meat patties, or warm up left over pizza, cook some Frozen fish and chips or melt some cheese on a bagel.....and so far it has done a great job. If I had to complain about anything on this oven, it’s that the knob on the bottom “ the timer” is hard to move, and once you set it, you can not go back. So you must choose carefully or if you want you can set another timer separately to let you know when the time is up. Going past the dark toast icon, to the 10, 20 numbers setting is also the same, you can not turn back the knob. Even though the timer may be set for more than you wanted to set it at, don’t worry because once you unplug it, the timer will continue but will shut off eventually!!. The broil setting does just that, and turns the oven only on the top. If you are heating up something that does not drip, do not use the drip pan provided, as the bottom of the food will not heat up as well, just put the food on the rack without the drip pan. ( I put foil paper on the very bottom to help keep it clean) . It is also very easy to clean since we do not cook main dishes in the oven. Overall I am very happy since it is a perfect size for two people.
It’s a fully functional, simple, toaster oven. Great for toast, warming leftovers, anything you wanna melt or toast.

Bought this to replace our broken one and decided to bring it to our trailer since it takes up much less space. Do all cooking in this if the pan fits as heats up quick saving time. Fits about 4-6 toast depending on bread size. Love the removable bottom tray for easily cleaning crumbs and spillage.
I like that the outside doesn't get hot, exept for the glass door. I also like that my toasts come out well done to my taste, but not dry, which used to happen with other toaster oven I've owned.
